title: Unisex Cork Bag Pack
description: Maleema's eco-friendly and stylish bag made from the highest quality hemp fabric and recycled wine corks. The bag features comfortable, adjustable straps and a spacious main compartment for all your essentials. Whether you’re heading to work, running errands, or going on a weekend adventure, this sustainable bag is the perfect companion.Fabric – made with Recycled wine cork and hemp

title: Upcycled Handwoven Multicoloured Shimmery Light Back Pack
description: A comfortable, spacious yet very easy to carry : reCharkha’s UPCYCLED HANDWOVEN ‘Light Backpack’ is a perfect choice for college classes as well as for travelling. Even though it is ‘light’ and highly portable, it has ample space to store your water bottle, wallet, keys and stationary for a hands-free experience while going about your day.

title: Desk & Travel Organizer
description: Oryx Dopp kit is a classy, 100% polyester-free, and plastic-free organizer for all kinds of needs. Electronics, Shaving accessories, Art supplies, Make-up - whatever you need to be organized, this Dopp kit with 4 liters of storage keeps them all in 4 very organized parts.It has a spacious main compartment, a full-body pocket on one side, and 2 smaller pockets on the other.

title: Duffle Trolley Bag
description: The uppercase JFK duffle trolley bag is the ultimate travel companion, catering to both men and women seeking a spacious yet accessible solution. With a U-shaped opening for full access and soft twin grab handles, this bag ensures convenience on any journey, be it for adventure or daily useThe unique and stylish design of this bag is the ultimate blend of durability and eco-conscious design, featuring a 1500-day International Warranty. title: Rhino Duffel
description: India's first plastic-free duffel  uses no form of plastic materials, no polyester, no plastic chains & it is vegan. Water-resistant canvas duffel named after endangered species RHINO. The Rhino Duffel is a 30-litre multifunctional duffel with great storage space, front and side pocket and detachable shoulder strap for flexible carry. It is perfect for a 5-day trip and is highly sturdyThe Rhino Duffel is for everyone who loves to keep things simple.

title: Backpack
description: A Zero Plastic Backpack as it uses no form of plastic materials, no polyester, no plastic chains & it is vegan. Sleek & Super Functional, the Amur Backpack lets you carry your daily essentials easily and has smart storage space to keep more while you go through your day. It's for everyone who is spirited and loves to be on the go.Our bags are made of sustainable fabrics, in this case, waxed canvas which is a water-resistant natural fabric
